title: Develop Custom Training Curriculum
description: A new enterprise customer has purchased a custom training package. A consultant must develop the curriculum.

tasks.description: Hold a discovery call with the customer's training lead to understand their key learning objectives and user personas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant gathers all necessary information to design the training.

tasks.description: Create a detailed curriculum outline and agenda, mapping learning objectives to specific product modules and features.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a structured and logical training plan.

tasks.description: Get approval from the customer on the curriculum before developing the training materials.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer and consultant are aligned on the training plan.
